title: Myanmar coup: U.N. special envoy warns "a bloodbath is imminent" if Security Council does not act
content:
1. Myanmar coup: U.N. special envoy warns "a bloodbath is imminent" if Security Council does not act  CBS News
  2. UN envoy warns of possible civil war in Myanmar as violence mounts  Arirang News
  3. Myanmar junta offers ceasefire to some, as UN envoy warns of 'bloodbath'  CNN
  4. Myanmar's Junta Needs to Feel More Than Western Sanctions to Halt Bloodshed  Bloomberg
  5. All nations must work together to stop violence in Myanmar  Nikkei Asia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
